Hi, I’m Daniel Kavanagh. I’m a DevOps Support Engineer and aspiring Software Developer, currently living in Dublin, Ireland. I made this site to exhibit the projects I’m working, and for some occasional blogging.

How to use Multiple Images

19 Oct 2017
Friday Theme HTML images Markdown Liquid

Here’s an example for multiuple images that uses Bootstrap’s card columns for a Masonry-like layout. It’s not perfect, but with some careful ordering of the images, you can get some good results. THis example also shows some Liquid tags used in conjunction with frontmatter variables.
